Title: Dragon Blades

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline if general is Order Draconis

Intro: Each model in a Dragon Blades unit is armed with a Drake Lance and Drake Sword.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Aelven Purebreeds are each armed with Ithilmar-shod Hooves.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Drakemaster. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Drake Lance and Drake Sword.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit if it includes any Standard Bearers. Add 2 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit instead if this unit includes any Standard Bearers and is within 8" of another friendly ORDER DRACONIS unit.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for this unit if it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Lance Charge
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Add 1 to the wound rolls and Damage of this unit’s Drake Lances and Swords if it charged in the same turn.

Rules.Name: Dragon Lance
Rules.Rule: If this unit makes a charge move, until the end of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with its Drake Lances and Drake Swords and add 1 to the damage inflicted by each successful attack made with its Drake Lances and Drake Swords.

Rules.Name: Drake Shields
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit.

Rules.Name: Ancient Dignity
Rules.Rule: Do not take battleshock tests for this unit if it is within 16" of a friendly ORDER DRACONIS HERO.
